document.full_text: after years of delay, construction of what is expected to be the first u.s. offshore wind farm, located off massachusetts' picturesque nantucket sound, could begin as early as this fall.
document.title: first offshore u.s. wind farm construction starts soon
lines_and_colors: after years of delay, construction of what is expected to be the first u.s. offshore wind farm, located off massachusetts' picturesque nantucket sound, could begin as early as this fall.
